body:
help2man is a perl script, it only needs gettext as an optional build dependency, and at runtime it'll try to use perl-gettext (which we don't even have).

The issue is that gettext does not configure out of the box on arm/aarch64/fujitsu, and I can't do anything about it because gettext has to be built to build help2man which is needed for autotools
title: drop gettext dep from help2man
